definition: to poke through a hornets' nest/to attack a difficult task resolutely
to stab/to poke/to prod/to nudge/to disclose
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: They warned him not to srir up a nest of hornets.
sentences.chinese: 他們警告他不要捅馬蜂窩。

sentences.english: Why are you trying to stir up a hornet's nest?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼要去捅馬蜂窩呢？

sentences.english: If you like defusing explosives, you'll love creating surveys.
sentences.chinese: 如果喜歡捅馬蜂窩，你就會喜愛調查表。

sentences.english: We're just about to kick a beehive.
